font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 衣冠楚楚的： being strikingly neat and trim in style or appearance
【例】 The students all looked very dapper in their uniforms.
【近】 natty, sharp, snappy, spruce
【反】 frowsy, unkempt, slovenly, unkempt 不整洁的
【记】 音：戴袍，顶戴袍服，指打扮精神整洁；音：diaper 穿着尿布的(宝宝)很精神，不穿的(宝宝)很脏
